Title: Relates to school tax relief exemption notification
Summary: Provides that notification of the approval of a STAR exemption be mailed to the applicant within thirty days of such determination.
LawCode: Amd ยง425, RPT L; amd ยง606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to notification of the school tax relief exemption
